name: Heartbeat - Make your choice
description:
Choose your destiny! Are you ready to fall in love and create your own love story? Make your choice and start your romantic journey! YOU are the heroine of every love story and you control how the love life goes! Choose wisely as it affects the course of the entire story!

LOVE GAMES FOR GIRLS
If you like love stories, romantic novels, teenage dramas. This is the love game for you!

CHOOSE YOUR STORY
You get to choose and develop the story in your own way! Will you live happily ever after with your prince charming?

CREATE YOUR LOOK
Dress to impress your special someone with fashion forward outfits that reflect your personality.

EXCLUSIVE LOVE STORY
Unlock the exclusive scenes with your own choice! YOU can have your special love story!

FALL IN LOVE
Get a date, fall in love and choose your one and only! Are you ready to play this love game?

GET DIFFERENT LIVES
Experience college drama, adventure like a teenager, fall in love with celebrities, be a New York socialite! Everything is possible!

Dive in and start your own adventure! Make your choice right now in this love game.
